Key Match Events: Otto López was a triple shy of the cycle
Connor Norby homered and drove in three runs
Xavier Edwards and Nick Fortes had two hits each
Javier Sanoja made his major league debut with a pinch hit appearance in the seventh
Kyle Schwarber hit a tying sacrifice fly in the third inning
Conine and Fortes scored on Turner’s throwing error
Post-Match Reflections: Marlins manager Skip Schumaker praised the team's performance despite clubhouse issues
Philadelphia’s manager Rob Thomson mentioned Nola's command issues
Miscellaneous Highlights: Miami added four new players to the roster
John McMillon pitched 1 1/3 innings of scoreless relief for the win
Aaron Nola allowed five runs and nine hits over 4 2/3 innings
Phillies' catcher J.T. Realmuto has some swelling but will remain with the club
Marlins placed Max Meyer, Calvin Faucher, and Derek Hill on the injured list
